root.name: Momotaro Dentetsu
root.description: OverviewMomotaro Dentetsu ("Momotaro's Railway") is a train-themed board game featuring the folklore hero of Momotaro, the Peach Boy. It is the first in Hudson's long-running series of the same name. The goal is for each player to drive a train around a board by rolling a die and trying to make as much money as possible, a la board games like Monopoly or the Game of Life.The game and its series is not to be confused with Momotaro Densetsu, an earlier RPG from Hudson featuring the same characters.

similar_games.game: Momotaro Dentetsu G: Gold Deck o Tsukure!
